title: Adequate safety measures shall be taken to reduce noise and air pollution etc
clause_text: Adequate safety measures shall be taken to reduce noise and air pollution etc.by providing vibration absorbing platform and dust settler;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Adequate safety measures shall be taken to reduce noise and air pollution etc.by providing vibration absorbing platform and dust settler;
